author: Florent Verbeke
text: 'Nice list of beers
column5: good bar food'

author: Ben Boatwright
text: 'Great service. Welcoming atmosphere. Decent beer selection.'

author: Tomas Ruiz
text: "Ambience is fine. Service is molasses. I heard staff complain while they worked like turtles. Meanwhile
column5: I was sober and could work five times faster. Ugh. Dive bar ultimately
column6: okay atmosphere with locals. All staff walks around with the worst 'whatever' attitude."

author: John Tringali
text: 'Very friendly and attentive staff. Great Covid safety'

author: Chris Frie
text: 'Love the live music üé∂'

author: Francolin
text: 'I like it.'

author: Jonathan Pepe
text: 'Best spot for live music and great beers in town. Loaded tots are awesome. Been coming here since they opened
column5: Eoin (Mr. Finnegan himself) is a great guy and only hires quality staff.'

author: Valentina Locatelli
text: "We like the place
column5: you can dine inside BUT they keep doors and windows open so it's as cold as outside across the whole place!"

author: Chris Gibson
text: 'They rock on all levels!  Please support!'

author: Mattington Bear
text: "I'd love to open my windows and get some fresh air but this place is so loud an annoying.\nEDIT FOR REPLY: I think I'm good.  I see your social distancing efforts lol."

author: Chris Sheridan
text: '2 outdoor TVs now through Covid
column5: live outdoor music
column6: and about 20 people allowed to sit indoors.'

author: Osborn Focht
text: 'Great music from Anthony Tamburro. Service and selection. Nice time.'

author: Kris M
text: 'Amazing grilled cheese and wings people! Go! Now...'

author: Priya Gautam
text: "I enjoyed the Tuesday half price on the grill. Haven't been there during the quarantine period"

author: BeeSee
text: 'Quick
column5: delicious
column6: greasy food like this is hard to come by in both takeout and in restaurant. Will be hard to not to become a regular'

author: Joseph Tierney
text: 'Stumbled upon this hole in the wall looking for a quick bite. Great beer selection and food was much better than expected. Chicken fingers are delicious
column5: my broad would call them the best in town. Stop by if you‚Äôre in Hoboken.'

author: Andy Belov
text: "Amazing burgers
column5: good IPA's. Always live music. Can't wait for your Bluegrass Jams to come back."

author: Beth Fitzgerald
text: 'My favorite spot!'

author: Jesse Watkins
text: 'Excellent neighborhood spot
column5: fantastic food
column6: top notch service and great live music.'

author: Niall Masterson
text: 'Great selection of drinks & food. Super staff. Fun place'

author: Raif Camara
text: '$0.50 wings on Tuesdays ‚ù§Ô∏è'

author: Andrew
text: 'Great hoboken Irish bar with live music every night'

author: Nicholas Currie
text: 'Pool tables are so much'

author: Emre O
text: 'Went for happy hour on a Thursday. Jeopardy was on. Huge nachos and a beer for just $14. Can‚Äôt beat. Good location'

author: Paul Lichstein
text: 'This place is a fine execution of a neighborhood pub.  Good bar food
column5: reasonable drink prices
column6: lots of TVs.    Nothing inherently special but if you go there enough everybody knows your name and they are always glad you came.'

author: Sam Mag
text: "It's kind of insane the vast difference in experiences I've had here. First time I went
column5: it was early in the evening on a weekday and my husband and I felt like this was an old timey bar where only locals would stay. Good God was I wrong when we went in on a Friday night to find club music
column6: bodies dancing and drinks flowing. What a crazy surprise for us and we made a few friends to boot."

author: Sushaant K.A.
text: 'Came here for the ‚ÄòGuy falling off stairs‚Äô men and also enjoyed the staff service'

author: Raghavendran R
text: 'Great place to watch arsenal games and good beers'

author: Rob Munoz
text: 'Just had a couple drinks here. Local watering hole. Waitress was nice and the crowd were locals . Good selection of drinks.'

author: Christine Guillermo
text: 'Best bar in Hoboken. Great music selection. Awesome bartenders. Kane on tap and solid bar food. Chipotle ranch wings and curry fries are a regular order for us.'

author: R O
text: 'Friendly service. Nice crowd. Great wings/bar food'

author: Tim Kain
text: 'Best bar and bartenders in Hoboken. The wings
column5: the loaded tater tots and the cajun chicken wrap are awesome. Great beer selection and weekly deals.'

author: Brian P
text: "Always great music
column5: can't go wrong here"

author: Cecelia Easterly
text: 'Cute pub. Nice drinks
column5: really chill vibe. And the bands are pretty dope.'

author: LisaAnn Hugo
text: "Not the place it used to be. Menu is just not the same. If you never knew it
column5: you'd be fine. Food is good and service is good."

author: Jeff Thibault
text: "Great draft list
column5: chill vibe
column6: and excellent service. If you're tired of the too loud music vibes of other Hoboken bars
column7: Finnegan's is exactly what you're looking for"

author: nelson capela
text: 'Great pub with affordable prices and good atmosphere.'

text: 'They have lots of darts
column5: a pool table

text: 'We had great food
column5: excellent service & watched a game

author: Maxwell Feinstein
text: 'My favorite bar in town as a musician and a patron'

author: Juan Moreno
text: 'Great Irish Bar!'

author: Steve Geiges
text: 'Great spot for any night
column5: but especially on Tuesdays for 50 cent wings and on Sundays for $3 drafts with all NFL games on. Very friendly staff that go out of their way to make you feel right at home.'

text: 'Solid Irish Bar'

text: 'Home. Everything is A+. Everyone is A++'

text: 'So much fun! Great bar with excellent food
column5: and skeeball. Actual skeeball. Skeeball rules.'

author: Gabrielle Mancuso
text: "Finnegan's is always a great time!"

text: 'yay live music and games'

text: 'This guy is falling just in front of everyone in the pub and nobody helps him!'

text: 'Great place'

author: Debbie Michels
text: 'Great atmosphere!'

author: Kevin
text: 'Great bar locals visit
column5: the usually have a good band playing. Pool tables and darts on the main level
column6: Skee-ball and more darts on the 2nd floor.'

author: Hakeem Lawrence
text: 'Live music. Cheap beers. Friendly bartenders. Good clientele. Nuff said'

author: Bala Kandhan
text: 'Very nice ambience. The staff here are very friendly. The food is really good and they have a very nice pool table. A great hangout spot for sure.'

author: Simon Smith
text: 'Trash'

author: Karan Sethi
text: 'Vibrant crowd
column5: and the darts/skeeball area upstairs is pretty cool.'

author: Gordon Baker-Bone
text: 'Great venue for comedy'

author: Jordan Ratliff
text: 'Finnegan‚Äôs never disappoints. The bar food is good
column5: has probably my favorite wings in Hoboken. The bar tenders are friendly and attentive
column6: and usually have a decent draft beer selection.They have fun activities like pool
column8: and my personal favorite Skiball! Also
column10: they have live bands most weekends

author: Russell Verducci
text: 'Good dive bar'

author: WIGGED OUT with Michael
text: 'Great place to grab a drink'

author: Sean Glendon
text: 'Friendly staff
column5: live music
column8: good food - this place has it all.'

author: Jeffrey Knorr
text: "Very friendly and accommodating staff at a friend's private party."

author: Christine B
text: "One of the few spots left in Hoboken that has live bands! That alone is worth 5 stars to me. There is a good variety of bands that play
column5: plus bluegrass night. I wouldn't say that it's a craft beer-focused pub but they have enough interesting beer to keep me happy. I've been to a couple of birthday parties in the upstairs room which is a nice option too if you want to have a private event but don't have space (or don't want to torment your neighbors) at home."

author: Robert Falco
text: 'Fun atmosphere. Good beer selection. Open mic night is cool too.'

author: michael powers
text: 'Great Irish Pub. Good food and great selection of drinks.'

author: Keith Wall
text: 'Great food and drinks'

author: Dom Wolfington
text: 'Great local pub for darts
column5: skeeball

text: 'Fell in love with the place the second I walked in! Coryle was amazing!!'

author: Andy Napolitano
text: 'Great open mic night!'
